text: Agatha of Lorraine (c. 1120 – April 1147) was the wife of Renaud III, Count of Burgundy.Gesta FridericiChronica Albrici Monachi Trium Fontium She was the daughter of Simon I, Duke of Lorraine and his wife Adelaide of Leuven.Agathe de Lorraine Agatha's children with her husband included: * Beatrice I, Countess of BurgundyContinuatio Admuntensis * Two other sons and three other daughters who died in childhood She fell sick in March 1147 and died two weeks later. ==External links== Category:Year of birth unknown Category:1147 deaths Category:12th-century French people Category:12th-century French women Category:Countesses of Burgundy Category:Year of birth uncertain
title: Agatha of Lorraine
